text: The FPS Finance (, , ), is a Federal Public Service of Belgium. It was created by Royal Order on February 17, 2002, as part of the plans of the Verhofstadt I Government to modernise the federal administration. It is responsible for the finances of the Federal Government and taxation. ==See also== * Minister of Finance (Belgium) ==External links== * Finance Belgium Belgium, Finance Category:2002 establishments in Belgium
title: Federal Public Service Finance
